title: CONGRATULATIONS - L’Oréal-UNESCO For Women in Science Award (Universiti Islam Antarabangsa Malaysia)
text: ( Source : Universiti Islam Antarabangsa Malaysia ) The members of the Kulliyyah would like to congratulate Dr. Wan Wardatul Amani Wan Salim on being awarded the L'oreal-Unesco for Women in Science . Founded in 1998 , the L'oreal-Unesco for
